Attention Parents of Virtual Students:

As a follow-up to our earlier message, LRSD had two technical issues that impacted access/use of the tools used by the District for virtual learning. Yesterday, as we were downloading student information to eSchool, a file became corrupted, which prevented students/staff from using Google as a part of the Schoology platform. That problem was addressed and corrected late last night.

Today, a different issue occurred as LRSD was attempting to provide greater access to YouTube videos for our teaching staff to use through Schoology. As the work was being done, our firewall was disabled and that caused the system to shut down. By 1 p.m. today, that issue had been corrected.

We sincerely regret the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

LRSD Elementary Summer School Update

The Little Rock School District has been monitoring developments related to the COVID-19 pandemic and takes the safety and security of our students and staff very seriously. In light of continuing concerns, LRSD has decided not to hold an in-person elementary summer school program. We are working with the City of Little Rock to provide literacy instructional support to our students virtually and in-person during the 2020-21 school year. We want to thank the City for its support of the District and we hope that everyone has a safe and enjoyable summer.

LRSD Welcomes Takecia Campbell as New Principal at Pinnacle View Middle School!

Ms. Campbell, who most recently served as 7-8th grade middle school principal in North Little Rock, brings a wealth of experience to the role at PVMS. She has served as principal, assistant principal, Curriculum and Instruction leader, math facilitator and teacher. Her career not only includes work in NLR, but Jacksonville and Pulaski County districts also.

Ms. Campbell will have an introductory meeting with her PVMS team tomorrow, followed by a forthcoming announcement regarding an introductory meeting with parents. We hope you will join us in sending congratulatory wishes to Ms. Campbell as she joins the LRSD family!
